tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I wanted to express my appreciation for Dr. Srishti exemplary behavior during my recent visit. Their attentiveness, patience, and clear communication made me feel respected and well-cared for throughout the appointment

Efforts to treat the people are well  and genuine, which is commendable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am sincerely grateful to Dr. Parveen Bhatia, Dr. Srishti Bhatia, and the entire team at the clinic.

After 24 years of my life, you have restored my smile😊. For these 24 years, I concealed my teeth, refraining from smiling openly in public due to the impact of a disastrous accident in 1999 that altered my teeth structure.

Commencing my treatment in February 2021 presented numerous challenges, including the hurdles of the pandemic, my battle with depression, and the continuous travel from Hyderabad and Visakhapatnam to New Delhi for treatment. 

Crucially, Dr. Srishti Bhatia addressed every single one of my concerns. Today, on November 16, 2023, I am pleased to share that my treatment has concluded successfully, and *I am entirely satisfied with the results.*👌👌

I extend my heartfelt gratitude to you for your unwavering effort and energy.

Regards,
Dharmesh Bansal
😊😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Appointment management system is not at all in place. Inspite of reaching 5 mins before the appointed time, had to wait for minimum 45 minutes. Yesterday, we had an prior appointment of 6:15 pm just to take already made retainer from Dr. Srishti's cabin. For this 30 seconds task, we were allowed to meet Dr. Srishti at 7:05 pm.
I had requested lady at the reception but she was insensitive towards such requests and time management. Hope this issue of appointment management will be taken care of. Thanks. 
Kamal f/o Suditi Dureja.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
For doctor Shristi Bhatia :

I visited for my daughter’s teeth alignment. I have been visiting from last one year twice a month  on appointment as per medical procedure for teeth alignment.  Doctor is very friendly nice and calm in nature .. Much experienced in her domain ..  quite satisfied..  and can recommend for dentistry related problem .

Raman Verma

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very professional approach & experienced doctor- explains very politely & have been taking treatment from this clinic for more than 25 years &get great satisfaction from treatment every time we visit

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
First of all thanks to Doctors and all the staff for such a good work.
All the staff have good experience and very good in nature.
Attend patients in a very nice way even I was late on my second visit bt they started treatment in just 15 minutes when I have reached.
I am satisfied by their work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Recommend 10/10.

Doctor Srishti Bhatiya is very friendly, professional, and knows what she's doing!
I got braces due to a gap in my front teeth; not only did she resolve that, but she also took care of other minor faults with my bite, listening and explaining everything along the way.

The entire process took around 8 months and a very reasonable fee. Overall, I'm happy with the results.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Very good, I would like to recommend it to my friends as well.
She takes care of her patients.
Love the way she elaborate the whole surgery.
It's hard to go to the doctor everytime, so she gives the consultation on whatsapp as well.
Replies on time and doesn't make her patients feel like they are not important.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: The doctor is very professional and she is very sweet also. She take care of me and every patient,  recommended the best treatment for us , the treatment is done very professionally and gently and they value patient time and money . They are very nice dentist. Bhatia dentopulse is amazing. Thank u Dr Srishti for taking care of me and doing my treatment wonderfully. I am very happy 😊🥰💜
reply_text: Thanks a ton😊 it's our pleasure 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Srishti is a thorough professional. Helps in understanding the issue and provides multiple treatment modules for a patient to choose from. I had anterior deep bite and crowding in lower teeth. She suggested ceramic braces for correction. I’m happy with the results and would 100% recommend her clinic for orthodontic procedures.
